timeline.bodyText:
could we use transform instead?

timeline.author: hendrikmuhs
hendrikmuhs

replies.bodyText:
This won't work, fieldNamesForGrouping always needs the group config field name so that it can add it to the mapping. Sometimes the group config has a desired type and that will get added to the new fieldTypesForGrouping map.
Adding comments explaining such.
replies.author: benwtrent

replies.bodyText: my bad, human parsing error: fieldTypesForGrouping vs. fieldNamesForGrouping - when reading over it the first time, it looked the same.
replies.author: hendrikmuhs
